org.bulldog.devices.portexpander

Class PCF8574

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bulldog.core.platform.AbstractPinProvider
      • org.bulldog.devices.portexpander.PCF8574
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterruptListener, PinProvider

    public class PCF8574
extends AbstractPinProvider
implements InterruptListener
    This class represents the popular PCF8574(A) I2C Port Expander family. It supports all the features of the PCF8574, including interrupts if you connect the INT signal to a DigitalInput of your board. You can use all the pins as if they are normal pins or you can read or write the state of all pins directly with the readState/writeState methods.

      • readState

        public byte readState()
        This method preservers the outputs' state and adjust the state of the inputs. Before it reads, it sets all the input pins that are to be read to high, according to the PCF8574 datasheet.
        Returns:
        the state read from the PCF857

      • setInterrupt

        public void setInterrupt(DigitalInput input)
